card.text: Flying Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.

card.name: Sylvan Brushstrider
card.text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sylvan Ranger
card.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Talrand's Invocation
card.text: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

card.name: Tempting Witch
card.text: When Tempting Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 3 life.

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Terrarion
card.text: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Thragtusk
card.text: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Thriving Bluff
card.text: Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red. {T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Thriving Grove
card.text: Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green. {T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Thriving Heath
card.text: Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white. {T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Thriving Isle
card.text: Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue. {T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Thriving Moor
card.text: Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black. {T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Thundering Spineback
card.text: Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1. {5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Tinybones, Trinket Thief
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. {4}{B}{B}: Each opponent with no cards in hand loses 10 life.

card.name: Tithebearer Giant
card.text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Towering Titan
card.text: Towering Titan enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total toughness of other creatures you control. Sacrifice a creature with defender: All creatures gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Trusty Retriever
card.text: When Trusty Retriever enters the battlefield, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Trusty Retriever. • Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ulvenwald Hydra
card.text: Reach Ulvenwald Hydra's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. When Ulvenwald Hydra enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vampire Neonate
card.text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Vastwood Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vedalken Archmage
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, draw a card.

card.name: Verdant Embrace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

card.name: Volcanic Fallout
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Wailing Ghoul
card.text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Wall of Blossoms
card.text: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Wall of Vines
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Warmonger's Chariot
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

card.name: Wildheart Invoker
card.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Winged Words
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying. Draw two cards.

card.name: Witch of the Moors
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature and you return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wizard's Retort
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Counter target spell.

card.name: Woodborn Behemoth
card.text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}. Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Young Pyromancer
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

card.name: Zendikar's Roil
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.text: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
